name: 11th Edition of Global Conference on Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems
content: Magnus Group is excited to announce the "11th Edition of Global Conference on Pharmaceutics and Drug Delivery Systems‚Äù (PDDS 2024) that will be held in a hybrid format, both online and offline, in Rome, Italy on September 19-21, 2024\. This conference is organized by Magnus Group with great enthusiasm, building on the enormous success of the previous ten editions of the Pharmaceutics and Drug Delivery Systems. The focus of this year's congress is on " Advancements in Pharmaceutics: Navigating the Future of Drug Delivery," with the aim of updating attendees on the latest advancements in pharmaceutics and drug delivery systems. The Pharmaceutical Meetings will be attended by professionals from various fields such as academia, pharmaceutical industry, research and development, and drug discovery laboratories. Pharma Conferences 2024 will also feature senior executives and renowned researchers specializing in pharmaceutical chemistry, quality control and assurance, clinical trials and pharmacovigilance, pharmaceutical manufacturing, pharmacognosy, biopharmaceutics, drug discovery, design and development, and pharmacoeconomics.
